page.original:
SQL::Query::ReleaseConnection() Syntax .ReleaseConnection() Argument Description A SQL::Query object created with a DIM statement.
Description The ReleaseConnection() method clears the SQL::Query.connection property. Examples dim qry as SQL::Query dim connString as C connString = "{A5API='Access', FileName='c:\program files\a5v7\mdbfiles\alphasports.mdb'}" qry.parse("Select * from Customer") ? qry.OpenConnection(connString) = .T. ? qry.ReleaseConnection() =
See Also SQL::Query Object Limitations
